mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.seal_contract_id AS "sealContractId", a.seal_contract_name AS "sealContractName", a.electronics_seal_id AS "electronicsSealId", a.seal_aside__id AS "sealAsideId", a.seal_aside_name AS "sealAsideName", a.seal_bside_name AS "sealBsideName", a.sys_resource AS "sysResource", a.seal_product AS "sealProduct", a.contract_effective_time AS "contractEffectiveTime", a.contract_file_name AS "contractFileName", a.contract_url AS "contractUrl", a.seal_time AS "sealTime", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seal_contract_record( id, seal_contract_id, seal_contract_name, electronics_seal_id, seal_aside__id, seal_aside_name, seal_bside_name, sys_resource, seal_product, contract_effective_time, contract_file_name, contract_url, seal_time, create_time, update_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sealContractId}, #{sealContractName}, #{electronicsSealId}, #{sealAsideId}, #{sealAsideName}, #{sealBsideName}, #{sysResource}, #{sealProduct}, #{contractEffectiveTime}, #{contractFileName}, #{contractUrl}, #{sealTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE seal_contract_record SET seal_contract_id = #{sealContractId}, seal_contract_name = #{sealContractName}, electronics_seal_id = #{electronicsSealId}, seal_aside__id = #{sealAsideId}, seal_aside_name = #{sealAsideName}, seal_bside_name = #{sealBsideName}, sys_resource = #{sysResource}, seal_product = #{sealProduct}, contract_effective_time = #{contractEffectiveTime}, contract_file_name = #{contractFileName}, contract_url = #{contractUrl}, seal_time = #{sealTime}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
